title: My friend just hit level 30, lost 50% of his placement matches, and got placed in Silver 3.
body:
He had a terrible KDA, was literally 0/8 in a majority of his games.

Meanwhile I hit level 30 around the same time on my smurf, won all 10 of my placements while having an insanely good KDA and carrying every game and I got placed in Bronze 3.  I went on to win my next 30 games before I broke out of Bronze.  I'm 46-4 as we speak and just now breaking into Silver 2.

Tell me some more about how ELO hell isn't real.
